lessons.japanese: その部屋のゲストは２０人いた。
lessons.indonesian: The guests in the room were twenty in number.

lessons.japanese: 防音設備が施されプライベートを重視したゲストルームです。
lessons.indonesian: It's a guest room equipped with soundproofing with an emphasis on privacy.

lessons.japanese: こちらのお部屋には、大勢のゲストの方がいらっしゃいます。
lessons.indonesian: There are many guests in this room.

lessons.japanese: うちには、ゲストルームはない。
lessons.indonesian: Our house doesn't have a guest room.
